comment.language: For the Feast of the Circumcision:

text.language: Qen pimah 8 (s~m/n) n~e~hoou: n~te pefjinmici m~paradoxon: afswp e~rof m~picebi: kata petc~se m~pinomoc.
On the eighth day: of His wonderful birth: He accepted to Himself the circumcision: according to the custom of the law.

language.div: Pada hari kedelapan: dari kelahiran-Nya yang ajaib, Dia menerima sunat bagi diri-Nya menurut hukum Taurat.

text.language: فى اليوم الثامن لميلاده العجيب قبل اليه الختان كعادة الناموس.
